title: League crashing in champ select.
body:
Like many others I have the problem where when I queue up for games and get into champ select  the game crashes usually with the error message: Lol.exe has stopped working. If this happens after I have picked my champion I can wait until the match launches and then reload, but if it happens before it ends the queue with " a player has failed to select a champion.  

currently sitting on a 2 hour queue wait time when I attempted to start a game with 2 friends and experienced a crash.  I can see that being the case because every couple of games it does crash so imagine it makes me look like I frequently dodge. :(

 I currently have windows 10, it was only the league client that is having difficulty  all other programs worked fine. Since then I rain the repair tool within the client  but cant even test in a bot game due to penalty.

I haven't had many of these champion select bug outs since 6.16, but one thing that did happen was a thing you had mentioned above. When it's my turn to pick in Ranked, after I choose my champion and click on "DONE" the lobby bugs out and goes blank. I hover around to reveal as much as I can of the blank UI as I can and then LoL crashes. Thankfully I can estimate when the game starts and then relog to reconnect to the game before closing the client.
Hello guys i have a problem with error dumb file 183 when im champion select crash please help me im wait you thx !! ;(

Crashes inside of champ select are most often caused by your client temporarily losing connection to the server, which disconnects you from the champ select instance. Any number of local or ISP network configurations could cause this, so our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if that guide caused any change.
